fields.description:
Document - Support snap deltas in Ceph for EBS Snaps, instead of uploading the entire snap to S3 every time.

Demo http://library.eucalyptus-systems.com/Engineering/video/Sprint_Demos/4_4/Euca-4.4-sprint-3-demos-2016-11-07-parts-all.mp4 @ the 29 minute mark.
fields.summary: Document support for snap deltas on Ceph - EBS snaps

comments.body:
Met with [~swathi] the other day. Just about to commit doc updates for this ticket. 

We talked about managing and troubleshooting snapshots, which is not up to date in the docs currently. Keeping these notes for future reference - 
- Manage snapshots – note about how a delete is a soft delete and so space might be taken up even if (in-between middle delta) snaps were deleted for example.
- Maybe start a Ceph section? Swathi will think about this. Below is an example existing Admin/Oper doc on snaps:
http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#admin-guide/ops_ts_snapshot_fail.html
the above topic is for only one type of backend (and out of date)
- Confluence – check the wiki for better documentation on this? 
https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/STOR/Troubleshoot+file+not+found+and+permission+denied+errors+during+snapshot+creation
the above topic is SAN-specific

[~swathi] please review and approve the updated topics:

http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#euca2ools-guide/euca-properties.html
- ZONE.storage.maxsnapshotdeltas property added
- ZONE.storage.shouldtransfersnapshots  property description updated

http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#release-notes/4.4.0/4.4.0_rn_features.html
- updated what's new entry

http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#install-guide/config_storage_ceph_rbd.html
- added step 6

http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#install-guide/config_block_storage.html
- added note about snap deltas to ceph-rbd bullet

Let me know if there are any errors or omissions. thanks!

[~ccassler] see above comment for updated docs. If you have any troubleshooting or managing snap delta suggestions, please add a note to this DOC ticket. thanks! 
CC [~tony] in case you have any suggestions
[~lincoln.thomas] please review and approve snap delta updates. See above comments for what's changed.

Relevant to EUCA-13080 - if we change the functionality in EUCA-13080, need to update the text (and potentially we should tweak the text for better clarity anyway - IRC discussion today demonstrates some confusion)

*ZONE.storage.maxsnapshotdeltas*	A non-zero integer value enables upload of incremental snapshots when possible. The configured value indicates the SC to create/upload that many snapshot deltas for a given EBS volume before triggering a full upload of the snapshot contents. Between any two consecutive full snapshot uploads for a given EBS volume there will be at most maxsnapshotdeltas number of incremental snapshot uploads. A value of 0 indicates that a newly created snapshot will always be uploaded in its entirety (that is, no deltas). Default value = 0.

*ZONE.storage.shouldtransfersnapshots*	Enable snapshot transfer to the OSG. Default is true. (Setting it to false will stop snapshots transfer, occasionally needed for cost savings.) Must be set to true for ZONE.storage.maxsnapshotdeltas to work.
Thanks for handling the Tech Preview [~khadges]. Please be sure and send this ticket back for SME review when you're done. (No reviewer has been available.)
tbex agreed to review the Tech Preview updates.

Made all changes above (except the deprecation note change).
http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#install-guide/config_block_storage.html
http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#install-guide/config_storage_ceph_rbd.html
http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#euca2ools-guide/euca-properties.html
http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#admin-guide/ops_ts_snapshot_fail.html
http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#install-guide/config_storage_ceph_rbd_hyperviser.html

Looks good to me! Just one nit on http://builds.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/branch/master/#admin-guide/ops_ts_snapshot_fail.html : The pathnames should be preceded by a '/', e.g. {{/var/lib...}} instead of {{var/lib}}
